summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1729, for the improvement of Arch Avenue, from West Holgate Street to West Massachusetts Street; Walnut Avenue, from West Holgate Street to Arch Avenue, and West Holgate Street from the east margin of Forty-first Avenue Southwest to the east margin of Arch Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and constructing wooden gutters along the sidewalks of the said streets and avenues, under Ordinance No. 18340, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
